remarks: Dedekind infinity implies existence of a denumerable subset: take a single point witnessing the proper subset relation and iterate the embedding.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 30-Oct-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-May-2015.)
statement: infpssr $p |- ( ( X C. A /\ X ~~ A ) -> _om ~<_ A ) $.
